categories.name: Corporate
categories.description: Profesyonel iş dünyası için kurumsal fotoğraflar. Yönetici pozisyonları, şirket profilleri ve resmi toplantılar için ideal.
categories.description_en: Professional corporate photography for business world. Perfect for executive positions, company profiles and formal meetings.

categories.name: Creative
categories.description: Sanatsal ve yaratıcı portre fotoğrafları. Özgün tarzınızı yansıtan, artistik ve etkileyici görüntüler.
categories.description_en: Artistic and creative portrait photography. Unique images that reflect your personal style with artistic and impressive visuals.

Corporate.Professional: Put the person in a traditional office environment with classic wooden furniture and formal atmosphere. Also, make sure they wear a classic business suit with traditional styling and conservative colors.
Corporate.Business Casual: Put the person in a modern tech office environment with glass walls, contemporary furniture, and innovative workspace design. Also, make sure they wear a sleek contemporary business suit with modern cut and trendy styling.
Corporate.Executive: Put the person in a very formal corporate boardroom environment with mahogany furniture and executive atmosphere. Also, make sure they wear a strictly formal business suit with conservative styling, tie, and traditional corporate appearance.
Corporate.Formal Meeting: Put the person in a conference room setting with professional meeting atmosphere. Ensure they wear formal business attire suitable for important meetings.
Corporate.Leadership: Put the person in an executive office environment that conveys authority and leadership. Dress them in premium business attire that reflects leadership qualities.
Corporate.Corporate Headshot: Create a professional headshot with clean corporate background. Focus on professional business attire and confident expression suitable for corporate profiles.

Creative.Artistic: Transform the person with artistic effects: add colorful paint splashes on their face and hair, apply vibrant artistic makeup with bold colors, add creative face painting designs, and enhance with artistic lighting effects on the person. Keep the original background unchanged, focus only on making the person artistic and colorful.
Creative.Bohemian: Transform the person into a bohemian style with flowing fabrics, natural textures, earthy tones, and free-spirited accessories. Add artistic elements like feathers, beads, or natural materials while maintaining a creative, unconventional aesthetic.
Creative.Vintage: Create a vintage-inspired portrait with retro styling, classic color grading, and period-appropriate elements. Apply vintage photo effects and styling that evokes a specific historical era.
Creative.Modern Art: Transform the person into a modern art concept with geometric patterns, abstract elements, and contemporary artistic interpretation. Use bold colors and innovative visual techniques.
Creative.Abstract: Create an abstract artistic interpretation with surreal elements, creative distortions, and experimental visual effects while maintaining the person's recognizable features.
Creative.Dramatic: Apply dramatic lighting effects, intense shadows, and theatrical elements to create a powerful, emotionally impactful portrait with strong visual contrast.
